Name: LU 727 - Landmarks, MANHATTAN DISTRICT 11 GARAGE AND LOT CLEANING UNIT, Manhattan (C 170269 PCM)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 170269 PCM (L.U. No. 727), a site selection and acquisition of property located at 207/217 East 127th Street (Block 1792, Lots 5 and part of 28), Community District 11, Borough of Manhattan, for use as the NYC Department of Sanitation Manhattan 11 District Garage and Lot Cleaning Unit Headquarters.

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Greenfield and Koo\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360       \tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on July 7, 2017 its decision dated June 21, 2017 (the "Decision") on the application submitted pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter by the New York City Department of Sanitation (\ldblquote DOS\rdblquote ), the Department of Housing Preservation and Development and the New York City Department of Citywide Administrative Services for site selection and acquisition of property located at 207/217 East 127\super th\nosupersub  Street (Block 1792, Lots 5 and part of 28), Community District 11, Borough of Manhattan (the "Site"), to facilitate the relocation of the NYC Department of Sanitation Manhattan 11 District Garage and Lot Cleaning Unit Headquarters (ULURP No. C 170269 PCM) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360       \tab WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360       \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on August 21, 2017;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360       \tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\expndtw0\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues including the negative declaration (CEQR No. 15DOS007M) issued August 3, 2016 (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\cf1\expndtw-5 The Council finds that the action described herein will have \expndtw-4 no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\cf0\expndtw0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d of the New York City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 170269 PCM, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision for the site selection and acquisition of the Site for relocation of DOS Manhattan 11 District Garage \par
\par
and Lot Cleaning Unit Headquarters with the following modifications:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sl276\slmult1 Matter in double strikeout is old, deleted by the City Council;\par
Matter in \uldb double underline\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\expndtw-3\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\expndtw0\uldb The application for site selection and acquisition is approved for a term not exceeding twenty years.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\expndtw-3\ulnone\par
Adopted.\par
\par
